title: THE 50 BEST Italian Restaurants near Medway, MA - 2026 Restaurantji
text: Customers` Favorites â€œMedway famous is the absolute best pizza house here in Medway for classic, family owned, quality pizza and food! There are not enough words to express how lovely the woman at the counter and her husband are! They are so accommodating, and sweet. We order pizza in larger quantities at a time for our shop. and they always have it ready right on time!. They take the best care of us and their food is fresh and good quality!!! They go out of their way to ensure everything you ask them for is there in the order. Extra sauces, napkins, drinks It is always spot on! They never disappoint. The pizza, pasta, subs are delicious! We, the Sullivan Tire crew, love Medway Famous and are so grateful they're practically our neighbor so we can enjoy the food often. Thank you for doing an outstanding job, consistently, and for being so accommodating! Mostly, thank you for making every experience a very pleasant one! Check them out, you will not be disappointed!â€œ Customers` Favorites â€œThe food here is amazing it's very tasty, I got the same thing I always get which is the delicious roasted beet salad and my friend tried it for the first time and she loved it!!
